name: postybirb-plus-ui
Author: Michael DiCarlo
description: (UI) PostyBirb is an application that helps artists post art and other multimedia to multiple websites more quickly.

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:styles && npm run build:compile
scripts.build:styles: npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:themes
scripts.build:tailwind: tailwind build -i src/styles/index.css -o public/styles/tailwind.css && npm run build:antd-tweaks
scripts.build:antd-tweaks: tailwind build -i src/styles/antd-dark-tweaks.css -o public/styles/dark-tweaks.css && tailwind build -i src/styles/antd-light-tweaks.css -o public/styles/light-tweaks.css && tailwind build -i src/styles/antd-base-tweaks.css -o public/styles/antd-tweaks.css
scripts.build:compile: prettier -w ./src/ && react-scripts build && shx mv front ../electron-app
